subtitles:
5131 8001 You gonna vanish
into thin air again?

11846 14337 I thought I'd use
your front door.

17309 23229 Look, man, um, I'm sorry
as hell for what happened
to you and your girlfriend.

35202 37823 I got stabbed!
I shot the son of a bitch!

37913 40534 I watched the bullet hole
close by itself.

40623 44158 And then my business
gets blown up real good.

44252 47455 - Other than that, my day sucked.
- Yeah.

47547 50085 I saw him too.
He had a guitar.

50174 54587 He winked at me before he jumped out
a fourth-floor window like he had wings.

61102 64055 So far I haven't heard shit about what
you're going to do about all this crap!

64146 69223 I mean, what do I get? My livelihood,
it got flushed away and went swirling.

74197 79155 And maybe you're not
such a big shot either! Ow!Jesus!

84374 88122 -Jesus.
- Say hello to the last fellow
who wouldn't cooperate with me.

88211 90203 What are you tellin' me, this--
You tellin' me this thing is real?

90296 93795 All the power in the world
resides in the eyes, fella.

93883 97928 Sometimes they're more useful
than the people who bear them.

98012 102175 You know, you're directly out of
your fucking mind! You know that!

107188 110141 It's one of the most important things
I learned from my sister.

110232 113150 Sister? She's supposed
to be your sister?

116947 120398 What's the matter,
you don't see the resemblance?

120492 123279 Now, let's take it
from the top, friend.

123370 125991 And a lot of detail.
What do you say?

126081 129532 He had a bird with him.
Nearly pecked my face off.

129626 133125 He-He told me to tell T-Bird
that death was on its way.

133213 137590 Whatever the fuck that means.
And-- Draven.
137675 140213 He said his name was Eric Draven.
140303 142426 Want to relax that thing now?

142513 147175 And this bird man,
he just happened to let you live, huh?

147268 151348 You sure you ain't making all of this up
just to save your own ass?
151438 154226 I ain't makin' all this up.

154316 158978 I ain't twisted
like you two fucks.

167287 172578 A boy and his bird.
Awful touching.

182844 185798 Oh, for fuck's sake, die, will ya?
Give me that thing.

192770 197432 - Thanks.
- Funboy said he saw a black bird too.

199902 203816 Then he choked to death
on his own blood.

203906 207405 I'll have the janitor, uh,
come on up.

280748 284413 It can't rain all the time--
Can't rain all the time--

284502 290207 Can't rain all the time-- Can't rain
all the time-- Can't rain all the time--

296013 298551 I don't know how many times I gotta
tell you. We're in this together.

298641 302472 We ain't and one part falls
and it all falls.

302561 304803 - Do you know how long it took us
to put this together?
- Yeah, a long time.

304897 308100 That piece of rat shit made Tin Tin
into a fuckin' voodoo doll.

313572 317699 Fire it up! Fire it up!
Fire it up! Fire it up!

323373 328414 - No Funboy.
- Probably still bangin' away on Darla.

369792 373208 What the fuck are you
supposed to be, man?

392064 396061 What's all this happy horseshit?
Hey, T-Bird! T-Bird!

401489 404739 - Oh, shit.
- What the fuck's the matter with you?

415795 420207 What do you want, man?
Money? Drugs? I got it.

421842 424713 We could use you.
You did Tin Tin.

435105 437513 I hate this.
They can't even call it cream legally.

448368 451155 When they flash us like that,
they ain't friends.

456751 459752 This is vehicle 38.
We got us a big ol'red hot rod.

465760 471002 You got somethin' personal, amigo,
we can work it out, right? Huh?
488156 490398 Oh, man, get out of the way!

519019 522720 Oh, I hate this.
This ain't good.

524149 526557 T-Bird, I got you, man!
I'm coming!

543585 545992 Remember? Yeah, I remember everything.
But I don't know--

546087 550334 What? What? Huh? What?
What are you talkin' about?

550424 554208 No, no, no, no, no.
You mean that place downtown?

554303 557304 Yeah, I remember her. We needed to
put some fear into that little lady.

557389 560426 She wasn't going along with
our tenant relocation programme.

560518 566437 Then her idiot boyfriend shows up
and turns a simple sweep-and-clear
into a total cluster fuck.

566523 569608 Who gives a shit?
It's ancient history.

569693 572943 What? What do you want?
What is it? What?
577742 581242 Did you send us these complaints?

587752 592165 I know you. I know you.
I knew I knew you.

594800 597173 But you ain't you.
You can't be you.

597261 600844 We put you through the window.
There ain't no comin' back.

600931 604098 This is the really real world.
There ain't no comin' back.

604185 606557 We killed you dead.
There ain't no comin' back.

611191 614145 There ain't no comin' back!
There ain't no comin' back!

621451 627370 ''Abashed the devil stood
and felt how awful goodness is.''
627457 630292 He felt how awful goodness is.

697358 699564 This is the 7.:00 a.m. edition
of Action News.

699651 702225 For over a decade,
the night before Halloween...

702321 706401 has had a darker and deadlier nickname
in the inner city-- Devil's Night...

706491 709943 the name given to what has become
an annual plague of arson.

710036 715375 Last year over 200
individual blazes were reported,
and 1 1 people lost their lives.

715458 720583 Tonight, on the eve
of what may become the biggest
and deadliest Devil's Night ever...

720672 724290 the mayor has firefighters from all
surrounding counties as well as--

724384 728167 Do you like them up or over?
I can't remember.

730222 733010 What are you doing?
I don't even like eggs.

738480 742145 So what do you want now,
black coffee and cigarettes?

742234 746232 So what did you take
to become Mother of the Year?

746321 750734 Oh, it wasn't drugs.
Someone kind of woke me up.

756665 761872 You're acting weird. Did you win
the lottery or something, Darla?

764464 769458 Oh, forget it. I never was
too good at this mommy shit.

793700 796369 This is the third hit
in your hood in 24 hours.

796453 799619 We just fished this out of the river.
He's fused to his own car.

799706 803917 - We're gonna have to I.D. his teeth.
- His name is T-Bird.

804002 807786 Arson was his specialty. Looks like
he zigged when he should have zagged.

820726 825388 I got a goddam vigilante killer
knockin' off scumbags left and right,
and you're covering up for somebody.

826941 829941 Who's the cartoon character
in the painted face?

830027 832185 Hey, you're the detective.
Why don't you tell me?

832279 835446 Okay. Gideon's blows all to hell,
and you're having a chitchat
with some weirdo...

835532 838568 who winds up in T-Bird's car
when it zigs instead of zags.

838660 841151 Then you steal one of
my case files from homicide...

841246 843618 and you're saying this is just
a fuckin' automobile accident?

843707 846245 - Come on!
- Yeah. Good speech though.

846334 850083 I didn't want to interrupt you.
It sounded good. You know,
you gotta write that shit down.

850171 855248 All right, smart-ass. The captain's got
a little love note waiting for you.

855343 857881 Welcome to the first day
of the rest of your suspension.

917820 920489 - One for sorrow, two for joy...
- Come here.

920572 923407 and three for a girl
and four for a boy.
1021544 1025293 You said, ''Can't rain all the time.''
1025381 1027789 That is from your song, right?
1038978 1041683 Come on, Eric, I know you're here.
1051448 1054022 Gets so lonely all by myself.

1057454 1061915 The hell with you.
I thought you cared.

1075513 1079012 That's him. That's him!
But he looked different.

1079100 1081306 He was all painted up white
like some kind of dead whore.

1081394 1084430 I seen him. T-Bird, he sent me in
for some road beers, right?

1084522 1087095 Then he took him away.
But I chased him down.

1087191 1090061 And he flash-fried T-Bird
to his fuckin' car!

1093656 1097605 Maybe we oughta just videotape this,
play it back in slow motion.

1099077 1103988 - Fire it up! Fire it up!
Fire it up! Fire it up!
- You see the grave?

1104082 1108874 - Empty.
- Fire it-- Grave? What grave?

1108962 1112331 - What about my fuckin' grave?
- Three out of four.
- Oh, man!

1112424 1115211 He's working his way
back to this speed freak right here.

1118012 1122306 That boy was out of control. T-Bird,
he came in, he says, ''Waste 'em both.''

1122392 1125760 And now this ghost
gonna kill my ass next!
1128773 1132640 This ghost gonna kill my ass next.

1132735 1135522 - This ghost gonna kill m--
- Hey.

1139491 1143109 - They have all arrived.
- Watch him.
1161471 1165848 He like his plain or with onions?

1169145 1173605 When someone's dead,
they can't come back, can they?

1176026 1178434 Are you referring
to anyone in particular?

1180948 1184780 Yeah, well, then maybe
they'll have to lock us both up.
1190749 1194200 Maybe it was your fairy godfather.
1194294 1196702 Eric didn't come back for me.

1196796 1202170 He can't be my friend any more
because I'm-- I'm alive.
1202260 1205676 You want a friend to walk you home?

1235125 1238126 I am the wicked
I am the wave of the future

1302106 1305273 It seems our friend T-Bird
won't be joining us this evening...
1305359 1308194 on account of a slight case of death.

1313534 1317863 Well, well, well.
Devil's Night is upon us again.

1317955 1323115 I thought we'd throw a little party,
start a bunch of fires,
make a little profit.

1327672 1332464 Problem is, it's all been done before.
You see what I'm sayin'?

1332552 1336502 - That's no reason to quit.
- Wrong.

1336598 1341306 Best reason to quit.
Only reason to quit.

1350820 1356194 The idea expands.
The idea becomes an institution.

1360329 1362784 See, that's what's
been bothering me, boys.

1362873 1365364 And I tell ya, when I used to think
about the idea itself...
1365459 1369587 it'd put a big old smile on my face.

1369671 1376420 You see, gentlemen,
greed is for amateurs.

1383226 1386476 - What about Devil's Night?
- What about it?

1386562 1389812 I started the first fires
in this goddam city.

1389899 1393102 Before I knew it, every charlatan
and shitheel was imitating me.
1393194 1397026 Do you know what they got now?

1406248 1413045 The idea has become the institution,
boys. Time to move along.

1413130 1415537 You don't want us to do
''Light My Fire'' time for the whole city?

1418134 1422346 No, I want you to set a fire so goddam
big, the gods'll notice us again.

1424349 1428133 I want all of you boys to be able
to look me straight in the eye
one more time and say...

1431272 1434024 - Hey, you! What's your name? Skank!
- Huh? What?

1434108 1437275 - You don't feel that?
- I feel like a little worm
on a big fuckin' hook.

1438779 1441187 ''I feel like a little worm
on a big fuckin' hook.''

1441282 1445611 Well, boy, your mama
must be damn proud of you.

1448539 1450745 How the hell'd that thing
get in here?
1456004 1459373 Let me go! Let me go! I gotta go!

1463970 1470803 So you're him, huh?
The avenger. The killer of killers.

1470894 1476018 Nice outfit.
Not sure about the face though.
1486158 1489741 I see you have made your decision.

1489828 1493577 - Now let's see you enforce it.
- Aw, this is already
boring the shit out of me.

1546758 1549712 Right here! H-Here, help me!
Help me! He's tryin' to kill me!

1662620 1665537 Guess it's not a good day
to be a bad guy, huh, Skank?

1665623 1671910 I'm not Skank.
There's Skank right there. Skank's dead.

1681847 1686923 - What in the crap--
- Don't move! Hold it!

1687018 1690434 That's all she wrote.
Move and we shoot!

1698321 1702401 You are surrounded by police units.
Do not attempt to escape.

1717256 1722048 Stop immediately.
Lie down, spread your arms and legs--

1776896 1779221 So many cops, you'd think
they were giving away doughnuts.
1790159 1792732 I knew you were going to do that.

1792828 1797953 Look at that out there. The whole
city oughta be in flames by now.

1800502 1804832 So that, I take it,
is the late, great Eric Draven.

1804923 1810593 He has power, but it is power
you can take from him.

1815767 1820595 between the land of the living
and the realm of the dead.

1820688 1825231 So kill the crow
and destroy the man.

1902100 1906014 You're gonna say
I shouldn't be in the cemetery
in the middle of the night. Right?

1906104 1910896 - The safest place in the world to be.
- That's 'cause everybody's dead.

1919826 1923870 You're just gonna have to
forgive me for that.
1934548 1937751 I gave this to Shelly once.
1941471 1944425 I think she'd like you to have it.
1948478 1951349 This way you'll always remember her.
1971959 1975375 I'd better go sneak back in the house.

2033977 2037393 What is that, some sort of souvenir
there from your pal?

2039441 2042110 I'll just keep it for good luck.
What do you say? Hmm?

2115681 2119014 Give me the girl,
and I'll let you walk out of here.

2121103 2125396 Well, well. Why don't you just give me
a minute to think about that, huh?

2154301 2157504 Well, well, well, it does seem to me
that our little life...

2157596 2160597 has undergone a rather significant
change in the past few minutes.

2166855 2170271 Well, for a ghost
you bleed just fine.

2173820 2176062 - It's still alive.
- Well, then kill it.

2227038 2231367 Well, I just came by
to pay my respects, and here you are
gettin' all shot up again.

2236630 2239548 - I can handle it. Don't worry.
- I'm not worried.

2239633 2243547 Look, here's the plan. You stay in
front, and when they run out of ammo,
I'll arrest 'em.

2243637 2247421 That sounds like a great plan.
There's just one problem.

2249768 2253018 Oh, shit.
You're bleedin' all over the place.

2253105 2255726 I thought, you know,
you were invincible.
2255815 2259267 I was. I'm not any more.

2260528 2264656 Well, I guess you really will
need my help, won't you? Come on.

2301359 2304811 - You were supposed to stay behind me.
- I think I messed up.

2328928 2334930 This is all the power you ever had.
Now it is mine.
2335017 2338884 Pity there is not more time...

2380519 2383769 You can have me.
I won't fight you.

2472899 2477442 You know, my daddy used to say,
''Every man's got a devil...
2477529 2479817 and you can't rest till you find him.''

2479906 2485660 Whatever happened back there
with you and your girlfriend,
I cleared that building.

2485745 2489161 Hell, nothin' in this town
happens without my say-so.

2489248 2492498 So I'm sorry if I spoiled
your wedding plans there, friend.
2492585 2495586 But if it's any consolation to you...
2495671 2498874 you have put a smile on my face.

2498966 2504209 You got a lot of spirit, son.
I am gonna miss you.

2504305 2508765 I have something to give you.
I don't want it any more.

2580420 2583586 - Everybody else dead?
- You helped me.
2584924 2587331 What you kept in here saved me.

2590596 2593881 I've been meaning to
come to church anyway.
2602399 2606479 I'm quitting as of now, if I live.
2615912 2618367 Stay with him until help comes.

2665960 2668961 - At least it stopped raining, huh?
- It can't rain all the time.

2669046 2673258 No, I don't believe it.
This nightmare your fault, Albrecht?

2673342 2676379 - Look, you go on home. I'm okay.
- Okay.

2676470 2680005 - You wanna tell me what's going on?
- Your vigilante's up on the roof.

2682017 2686229 - You missed it.
- Get him out of here.

2757799 2761084 If the people we love
are stolen from us...

2761177 2765755 the way to have them live on
is to never stop loving them.
2859229 2864650 Oh, it won't rain all the time
2922666 2927374 Is there something more to believe in
3132826 3138580 Falling farther from just what we are
3140584 3145245 Smoke a cigarette and lie some more

3179496 3184371 Time to wait too long
to wait too long
